node.display_long_description:
Audio Trip is a VR dance game where you catch gems, ride ribbons, smash drums, and dodge barriers as you dance your way through surreal environments specially crafted for each song.

Make it your Audio Trip by using the in-VR level editor to create custom choreographies with your own unique dance moves, with the same tool used by the developers to create their choreography! Join in on our Choreography Contest to showcase your flair! [Discord http://audio.chat]

Main Features
• Licensed music by top artists: Skrillex, Zedd, deadmau5, Lady Gaga, Tiësto... and more coming soon!
• In-VR level editor (“Choreographer” tool) included.
• ‘Full’ or ‘Short Trip’ options for each song.
• Fully immersive hand-crafted environments for each song.
• Intuitive UI with a simple tutorial for your first time playing.
• Gameplay customization: ‘Comfort’, ‘Dancer’, ‘No Fail’, ‘Color Swap’.
• Global and Local (Party Mode) Leaderboards to challenge your friends!
• Many more features and content coming soon!

latest_supported_binary.change_log: Get Funky with our largest content update ever! 3 new FREE songs

nodes.title: GET FUNKY with THREE new songs in our BIGGEST content update yet
nodes.body_text:
GET DOWN, GET FUNKY
Is it us or is it getting funky in here? This mega new free update contains 9 new choreographies in 3 funk filled songs, with all new trippy environments to dance through!

Look for these new songs in your playlist:
In need of a warm up session before breaking a sweat? Check out Freedom” by The Originals - try it out for a great way to warm up and get into the zone.

Wanna get reaaal dancey? Hop straight into Can't Take It, Pt. 2 by Hot Rod Elegants or Keep My Cool by Benj Heard and show us your best funky dance moves!

Now, go on, get down with your bad self!
♥️ Kinemotik

nodes.title: Make this YOUR Audio Trip: Customization features!
nodes.body_text:
The holiday season is near and we've decorated our Hub World to celebrate the ☆*:.｡festive season.｡.:*☆! Since the outdoors are a luxury now, we hope you enjoy the snow in Audio Trip!

ALSO, in case you missed it, check out all of the new customization features we've recently included in Audio Trip:

CUSTOM GEM COLORS
Choose any color you want to suit your preference, help with visibility, or to match your branding! :D

AUDIO ADJUSTMENT OPTIONS
We've added the ability to adjust individual volumes for the:
- Music
- Gameplay sound effects
- Negative Feedback
- Audio filtering amount
- Hub World

Now you can have it your way! Turn music volume to 0, game feedback to 100! We don't judge!

NEW LEADERBOARDS FOR CUSTOM SONGS & CHOREOGRAPHY!
Many of you Trippers have started creating your own trips, and we want to let you compete with those as well - so now you can! Check them out next time you play anything you've created.

Have a blast!
♥️ Kinemotik

node.internet_connection_name: 下载内容需要连接网络

node.reviewDescription:
I also purchased this on the Black Friday discount and am so glad I did (though it's definitely a bargain at full price). As a 48-year-old solo resident  mid-pandemic, it can be difficult to get away while on a work from home schedule when my previous commute provided more activity. I tend to rotate fitness apps but this one so far seems to provide the most well-rounded experience, and AT workouts are particularly effective with velcro wrist weights!
I know licensing can be very tedious, but I'm still excited to see what new releases will bring. It would be amazing to have access to some old '70s-'80s electronic/synth/space pop (e.g. playlists similar to Radio Soulwax Celestial Voyage mixes).

website_page_meta.description: Audio Trip is a VR dance game. Players move their bodies to catch colored gems, ride ribbons, smash drums, and dodge barriers -- which together form exhilarating dance choreographed by a professional dancer.
website_page_meta.title: Audio Trip · Oculus Quest
